channel.title: ASA on Engineering Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content in ASA on Engineering Field Notes

item.title: NO-NAT configuration on Cisco ASA Firewall
item.description: Cisco ASA firewall has upgraded its command line at the version 8.3 and changed a lot of configurations from their previous style. I recently faced two cases about NO-NAT in both version and want to leave a quick note here. Example details: inside IP address: 1.1.1.0/24 outside IP address: 2.2.2.0/24 traffic go through from inside interface to outside interface Before 8.3 An access-list is needed to filter the interested traffic.
